Feb. 21, 2015 D Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship
Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship 0 Entertainments Contest
welsh-open-brass-band-entertainment-championship
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Best Entertainment: City of Cardiff Highest Placed First Section Band Not in Prizes: Abergavenny
Best Soloist: Andrew Porter (euphonium), Sandhurst Best Cornet: Rhydian Griffiths, Staines Best Horns: Llwydcoed Best Percussion: Parc & Dare Youngest Player: Zac Roynon Griffiths, Age 9, Kit Percussion, Abergavenny Graham Rees Memorial Bursary to Young Player: Emily Evans, Tongwynlais
Jan. 22, 2015, 1:33 p.m. Feb. 23, 2015, 10:53 a.m.
